faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Asset Nudge

items.question: What is Asset Nudge?
items.answer: Asset Nudge is a specialized SaaS tool designed specifically for Unity Asset Store publishers. It helps developers analyze their asset listings, identify areas for improvement, and implement changes that increase visibility, downloads, and sales.

items.question: Do I need to connect my Unity account?
items.answer: No, you don't need to connect your Unity account. Simply enter your asset details or URLs to analyze and optimize. Asset Nudge works by analyzing publicly available information about your assets and the marketplace.

items.question: How fast will I see results?
items.answer: Many users see improvements in their asset's performance within 1-2 weeks of implementing our suggestions. The exact timeline depends on your asset's category, competition, and how thoroughly you implement the optimization recommendations.

items.question: How does pricing work?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing tiers designed to scale with your business needs, from starter plans for individual traders to enterprise solutions for large organizations.

items.question: Is my information safe?
items.answer: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All your information is encrypted and protected using industry-standard security protocols. We don't share your data with third parties, and you retain full control over your account information.

items.question: Do you offer refunds if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not completely satisfied with Asset Nudge, contact our support team within 30 days of your purchase for a full refund.
